title: AED Game Character Voice - The Inquisitor
description: In a realm where judgment reigns, embody The Inquisitor – shrewd, pious, and wielding the roles of judge and executioner with unyielding determination.
longDescription:
Audio Demo

Album Art by Dalton Webb


AED Game Character Voice - The Inquisitor voice-over sound library provides you with more than 300+ immersive, game-ready voice-over sound files, vocalizations, custom character specific dialogue lines, stock non-player character dialogue lines, and everything needed to create compelling cinematic scenes, characters, and outstanding game-play audio experiences. 


The Inquisitors voice profile is nasal, judgemental and dripping with sophistication and holy piousness. He is perfect for Judge or Executioner in-game non-player characters or any arrogant game characters.His voice is ready for your game as is, provided in a clean and dry audio format in case you want to further process the vocals with effects.


Features:


-Vocal Profile: Arrogant, Full of themselves, posh, fanatical.

- Perfect for NPC's in game and/or film based trailers.

-Featuring custom lines and NPC stock lines like: Kill them, I will destroy you, Attack, Set fire to it, By my righteous hand you shall see your evil end. Perfect for MMO's, RPG's MOBA and RTS games.

-Featuring a variety of laughing, fighting, jumping and pain vocalizations to fully flesh out your next hero or villain in game!

-Works with any DAW or Game Engine

- Royalty Free and YouTube friendly

- Ready to rock, straight out of the box!
technicalDetails:
Features:

Male voice-over audio files

133 MB of voice samples

All in 44.1k/16 bit .wav file format


Number of Audio Waves: 375


Number of Audio Cues: 375


Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k/16bit


Do Sound FX loop: No


Windows: Yes


Mac: Yes
